response.overview: High powered businesswoman Abigaiil Morris is tired of dealing with the trappings that come along with being a CEO girl boss. Sick of having to always be in control, she wants someone else to tell her what to do for a change. More than anything, Abigaiil yearns for someone to take charge and fuck her into submission! She pays a visit to Derek Savage, who is more than happy to use the big boobed redhead as his pervy plaything.
response.title: Control Freak Fucked Into Submission
